com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.achievemen: Do 4,000 damage to opposing Pokémon with your {F} Pokémon.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a card and put it into your hand. Then, shuffle your deck.
tpci.2017.darkrai.blister.bundle.2-3: Get in on the Pokémon TCG action with three awesome booster packs, 1 special holographic promo card featuring Darkrai, and a cool Pokémon coin to add to your collection!
tpci.2017.darkrai.blister.bundle.2-4: This bundle contains: 1 foil Darkrai Pokémon card (Black Star Promo, XY22) 3 Pokémon TCG: XY—Phantom Forces booster packs (10-card) 1 blue Xerneas coin This offer runs through July 25, 2017. These cards are legal for Expanded format tournaments and competition.
tpci.2017.pokemon.league.q2.season3.desc: Thank you for attending your local Pokémon League! This code will unlock 4 foil promo cards featuring Oricorio (Sensu Style) and a set of Sun & Moon—Guardians Rising themed card sleeves for you to enjoy or trade!
tpci.2017.pokemon.league.q2.season3.name: Sun & Moon—Guardians Rising Season 3
tpci.2017.pokemon.league.q2.sleeve.name: Sun & Moon—Guardians Rising Card Sleeves
